meanings.definition: The quality or state of being swarthy or dark in complexion.
meanings.sent1: Her swartnesses made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the swartnesses of the model's skin tone perfectly.
meanings.sent3: Despite her swartnesses, she had a radiant smile that lit up the room.
meanings.sent4: The shadows of the night added a mysterious swartnesses to the forest.
meanings.sent5: The swartnesses of the old painting gave it an air of antiquity.

meanings.definition: The act of making something swarthy or dark in complexion.
meanings.sent1: His skillful use of makeup created stunning swartnesses on the actor's face.
meanings.sent2: The swartnesses in the painting were achieved through careful shading techniques.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous artist added unexpected swartnesses to his cartoon characters.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds brought a deep swartnesses to the sky.
meanings.sent5: The chef's secret ingredient added a rich swartnesses to the dish.
